hopobject.name: CapeContest
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0)
hopobject.body:
Announcing the BeagleBone Cape Plug-in Board Design Contest. Have you seen the latest BeagleBone Capes? Do you think you have a great idea for a new BeagleBone cape? Then submit your design for the chance to have your cape created and sold. Your friends will be envious of you, your children will admire you and you'll be the rock star of the Beagle community! Plus, you get a cut of the profits!

Read the important info below and click on the button when you are ready to enter. Good luck!

How to Enter

  1. Come up with an original cape design. Minimum requirements:
    • Schematic layout (including reference designators and an extractable net-list)
    • Bill of Materials not to exceed $60 (in Excel format; noting reference designators and manufacturer part numbers)
  2. Upload your project to a file sharing site (ex: Github) for it to be viewed.
  3. Record a video describing your cape idea and upload it to YouTube. Get creative with it!
  4. Click on the ridiculously big Submit Design Here button above to submit your BeagleBone Cape Design Contest entry.

Judging/Voting

  1. On January 7, 2013 a completed entries page will go live listing all the submitted entries that meet the minimum requirements.
  2. The whole internet connected world will be your judge.
  3. During the judging phase you can go to the page to see in real-time how your design is being voted.
  4. Get everyone you know to vote for your design!

Key Dates

  • Submission: November 1 - December 31, 2012 11:59:59 PM PST
  • Judging: January 7 – 21, 2013
  • Winners announced: January 25, 2013

Prizes

Grand Prize:

The top three (3) winning designs will:

  • Have their design manufactured and sold through CircuitCo Electronics
  • Get $500 from Texas Instruments
  • Get $500 from Mouser
  • Choice of the following tools from Total Phase:
    • Beagle USB 480 Protocol Analyzer
    • I2C/SPI Kit
    • CAN/I2C Kit

Weekly Prizes:

A weekly contest will be posted on beagleboard.org, Facebook, Twitter and blogs. The winner will be randomly selected from all correct entries and will receive one of the following prizes:
  • Tools from Total Phase
  • ProtoCapes from AdaFruit
  • MetaWatches from Mouser

Sponsors

Contest Guidelines

  • You must be 18 years or older.
  • To enter you must submit an original BeagleBone cape design limited to a maximum $60 bill of materials cost.
  • Entries must have a minimum of schematic capture and bill of materials hosted on file sharing site (ex: Github).
  • Entries remain the property of the submitter with rights to manufacture and sell granted to CircuitCo.
  • Sponsor employees and immediate family are not eligible.
  • Winners will be notified by email of their winning entry.
  • The top three winners will be announced on BeagleBoard.org and through other media outlets.
  • Teams can enter, but each team should designate only one representative per entry who receives that prize should that team win.

BeagleBone Cape Contest Resources

  • BeagleBone Capes
  • Ideal Entry
  • BeagleBone Cape Design Contest Official Rules
  • Eagle Layout Tools
